00017     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00018     ViewFrustumCullingTraversal::ViewFrustumCullingTraversal  (Occlusion& o):
00019         occlusion(o), 
00020         mCurrentVisibility (PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera::NONE)
00021     {
00022         
00023     }
00024     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00025     void ViewFrustumCullingTraversal::onTree(PagingLandScapeOctree& node)
00026     {
00027         PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera::Visibility newVis = mCurrentVisibility;
00028 
00029         if (newVis != PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera::FULL)      
00030         {
00031             // box is not hierarchically culled as inside frustum box
00032             // so we need to check it.
00033             newVis = occlusion.mCurrentCam->getVisibility(node.getCullBoundingBox ());
00034              // if the octant is invisible
00035             if (newVis == PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera::NONE)
00036             {
00037                 // Culled Octree.
00038                 // outside frustum
00039 
00040                 #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00041                     node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = false;
00042                     node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->queryVisible = false; 
00043                     occlusion.frustum_culled_nodes_cnt++;
00044                             occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++;
00045                 #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG
00046 
00047                 return;
00048             }
00049         }
00050   
00051         #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00052             node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = true;
00053             node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->queryVisible = true;
00054                     occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++;
00055         #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG
00056 
00057         // if we get there, then it's at least partially visible. 
00058         // Store parent Vis 
00059         PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera::Visibility oldVis = mCurrentVisibility;
00060         mCurrentVisibility = newVis;
00061 
00062         traverseChildren (node);
00063 
00064         // Restore Parent Vis so that bothers can be pre-culled.
00065         mCurrentVisibility = oldVis; 
00066     }
00067     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00068     void ViewFrustumCullingTraversal::onLeaf(PagingLandScapeOctreeNode &node)
00069     {
00070         // if this PagingLandScapeOctree is partially visible, manually cull all
00071         // scene nodes attached directly to this level.
00072         PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera::Visibility newVis = mCurrentVisibility;
00073         if (newVis != PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera::FULL)      
00074         {
00075            newVis = occlusion.mCurrentCam->getVisibility(node.getCullBoundingBox ());
00076            // if the node is invisible
00077            if (newVis == PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera::NONE)
00078            {
00079                 // Culled Node.
00080                 // outside frustum
00081 
00082                 #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00083                     node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = false;
00084                     node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->queryVisible = false; 
00085                     occlusion.frustum_culled_nodes_cnt++;
00086                             occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++;
00087                 #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG
00088 
00089                 return;
00090            }
00091         } 
00092 
00093         #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00094             node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = true;
00095             node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->queryVisible = true;
00096                     occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++;
00097             occlusion.object_cnt++;
00098         #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG
00099 
00100         // if we get there, then it's at least partially visible.  
00101         // Store parent Vis 
00102         PagingLandScapeOctreeCamera::Visibility oldVis = mCurrentVisibility;
00103         mCurrentVisibility = newVis;
00104 
00105         node._addToRenderQueue (occlusion.mCurrentCam, 
00106                                 occlusion.mCurrentRenderQueue, 
00107                                 occlusion.mOnlyShadowCaster);
00108 
00109 
00110         // Restore Parent Vis so that bothers can be pre-culled.
00111         mCurrentVisibility = oldVis; 
00112     }

00117         occlusion(o)
00118     {
00119         
00120     }
00121     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00122     void ViewFrustumCullingTraversalDirect::onTree(PagingLandScapeOctree& node)
00123     {
00124         if (occlusion.mCurrentCam->isVisible(node.getCullBoundingBox ()))      
00125         {          
00126 
00127             #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00128                         occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++;
00129                 node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = true;
00130                 node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->queryVisible = true;
00131             #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG
00132 
00133             // if we get there, then it's at least partially visible.   
00134             traverseChildren (node);     
00135         } 
00136         #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00137             else
00138             {
00139                 // Culled Octree.
00140                 // outside frustum
00141                         occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++;
00142                 occlusion.frustum_culled_nodes_cnt++;
00143                 node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = false;
00144                 node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->queryVisible = false;     
00145             }   
00146         #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG     
00147     }
00148     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00149     void ViewFrustumCullingTraversalDirect::onLeaf(PagingLandScapeOctreeNode &node)
00150     {
00151         // if this PagingLandScapeOctree is partially visible, manually cull all
00152         // scene nodes attached directly to this level.
00153         if (occlusion.mCurrentCam->isVisible(node.getCullBoundingBox ()))      
00154         {          
00155             #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00156                         occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++;
00157                 node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = true;
00158                 node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->queryVisible = true;
00159                 occlusion.object_cnt++;
00160             #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG
00161 
00162             // if we get there, then it's at least partially visible.  
00163             node._addToRenderQueue (occlusion.mCurrentCam, 
00164                                 occlusion.mCurrentRenderQueue, 
00165                                 occlusion.mOnlyShadowCaster);
00166 
00167         } 
00168         #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00169             else
00170             {
00171                 // Culled Octree.
00172                 // outside frustum
00173                             occlusion.traversed_nodes_cnt++;
00174                     occlusion.frustum_culled_nodes_cnt++;
00175                     node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->viewFrustumVisible = false;
00176                     node.getNodeData (occlusion.mCurrentCam)->queryVisible = false; 
00177             }
00178         #endif //_VISIBILITYDEBUG    
00179     }
